class PhenotypeComponent_1101 extends PhenotypeComponent 
{ 
  var $tool_type = 1101; 
  var $bez ="Überschrift"; 

  function setDefaultProperties() 
  { 
      $this->set("bez","Überschrift");
      $this->set("subline",""); 
  } 
   
  function edit() 
  { 
     $this->form_textfield("Schlagzeile","bez",$this->get("bez"));
     $this->form_textfield("Unterzeile","subline",$this->get("subline"));
  } 

  function update() 
  { 
    // Auswertung der Eingabemaske und Setzen der Properties 
    $this->fset("bez"); 
    $this->fset("subline"); 
  } 
   
function setFullSearch()
  {
    $s = $this->get("bez") . "|" . $this->get("subline");
    return ($s);
  }

  function render($style) 
  { 
    eval ($this->initRendering()); 
    $mySmarty->assign("bez",$this->getH("bez")); 
    $mySmarty->assign("subline",$this->getH("subline"));
    $html = $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_1); 
    return $html; 
  } 
   
}
